Celsius to Fahrenheit Converter

47 degrees Celsius equals 116.6 degrees Fahrenheit. This temperature conversion is commonly used inscientific and industrial applications.

116.6

How it feels outside
At 47Â°C: Very Hot / Extreme Heat. Limit outdoor activity and seek shade.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is 47 degrees Celsius in Fahrenheit?
47 degrees Celsius equals 116.6 degrees Fahrenheit. The formula is Â°F = (47 Ã— 9/5) + 32.
Is 47Â°C hot or cold?
47Â°C is considered Extreme Heat. Dangerous temperature capable of causing heatstroke
